trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access on the server to the HTML <see langword="<table>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML <see langword="<table>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control to programmatically control the HTML `<table>` element on the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制來以程式設計方式控制 HTML`<table>`在伺服器上的項目。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a table on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您在網頁上建立資料表。

trans-unit.source: You can dynamically change the appearance of the `<table>` element by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以動態變更的外觀`<table>`藉由設定項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also control how the content of a cell is displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以控制如何藉由設定顯示儲存格內容<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The rows of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control are stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制會儲存在<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to programmatically access the individual rows of the table.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您以程式設計方式存取個別的資料列的資料表。

trans-unit.source: A complex table model is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援複雜的表格模式。

trans-unit.source: You cannot have an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control with nested `<caption>`, `<col>`, `<colgroup>`, `<tbody>`, `<thead>`, or `<tfoot>` elements.
trans-unit.target: 您不能有<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制與巢狀`<caption>`， `<col>`， `<colgroup>`， `<tbody>`， `<thead>`，或`<tfoot>`項目。

trans-unit.source: These elements are removed without warning and do not appear in the output HTML.
trans-unit.target: 這些項目移除而不發出警告，並不會出現在輸出的 HTML。

trans-unit.source: An exception will be thrown if you attempt to programmatically add these table model elements to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試以程式設計方式加入至這些資料表模型項目，則擲回例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control to display information in a table.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項來顯示資料表中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to dynamically create an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以動態方式建立<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The "table" literal string.
trans-unit.target: 「 資料表 」 的常值字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a new instance of an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control and place it on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制，並將它放在網頁上。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項相對於 Web 網頁上其他項目的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The alignment of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 和 Web 網頁上其他項目相關的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項之對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A> property to specify the alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A>屬性，以指定的對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>相對於其他項目在網頁上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property does not control the alignment of the contents in the cells of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會控制的儲存格內容的對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To control the alignment of contents of an individual cell, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要控制個別儲存格內容的對齊方式，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.Align%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell.VAlign%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableCell>類別。

trans-unit.source: You can also control the alignment of contents of the cells in an entire row by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用來控制內容的整個資料列中的資料格的對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.Align%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow.VAlign%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRow>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values that can be used for this property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可以使用這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: 值

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Aligns the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control on the left edge of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>的左邊緣的網頁上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control in the middle of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>中間網頁上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Aligns the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control on the right edge of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>網頁的右邊緣的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you specify `Left` or `Right` alignment, other elements on the Web page will wrap to the right or left of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`Left`或`Right`對齊方式，在網頁上的其他項目會自動換行的左右<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>分別控制。

trans-unit.source: If you specify `Center` alignment, no wrapping occurs and other elements appear below the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`Center`對齊方式就會發生任何換行及其他項目會出現在控制項下方。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A> property to specify the alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Align%2A>屬性，以指定的對齊方式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>相對於其他項目在網頁上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The background color of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A> property to specify the background color of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>屬性，以指定的背景色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB.
trans-unit.target: 您可以依名稱或使用前面加上井字號字元的十六進位值，指定的色彩 （#），#RRGGBB 形式。

trans-unit.source: RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255 的色彩，紅色、 綠色和藍色元件分別表示。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 # 0000ff> 代表藍色的色彩。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: 它的最小值 (00) 給紅色和綠色的元件，而指定的藍色元件為指定的最大值 (FF)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。

trans-unit.source: Color name
trans-unit.target: 色彩的名稱

trans-unit.source: Hexadecimal value
trans-unit.target: 十六進位值

trans-unit.source: Aqua
trans-unit.target: 青色

trans-unit.source: #00FFFF
trans-unit.target: #00FFFF

trans-unit.source: Black
trans-unit.target: 黑色

trans-unit.source: Blue
trans-unit.target: 藍色

trans-unit.source: Fuchsia
trans-unit.target: 粉紅色

trans-unit.source: #FF00FF
trans-unit.target: #FF00FF

trans-unit.source: Gray
trans-unit.target: 灰色

trans-unit.source: Green
trans-unit.target: 綠色

trans-unit.source: Lime
trans-unit.target: 淺綠色

trans-unit.source: Maroon
trans-unit.target: 暗紅色

trans-unit.source: Navy
trans-unit.target: 海軍

trans-unit.source: Olive
trans-unit.target: 深黃色

trans-unit.source: Purple
trans-unit.target: 紫色

trans-unit.source: Red
trans-unit.target: 紅色

trans-unit.source: Silver
trans-unit.target: 銀級

trans-unit.source: #C0C0C0
trans-unit.target: #C0C0C0

trans-unit.source: Teal
trans-unit.target: 藍綠色

trans-unit.source: White
trans-unit.target: 白色

trans-unit.source: #FFFFFF
trans-unit.target: #FFFFFF

trans-unit.source: Yellow
trans-unit.target: 黃色

trans-unit.source: #FFFF00
trans-unit.target: #FFFF00

trans-unit.source: The available colors for use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A> property can be determined from the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用可用的色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>屬性可由<xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Color names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A> property to programmatically control the background color of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BgColor%2A>屬性以程式設計方式控制的背景色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the border of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The width (in pixels) of the border of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的框線寬度 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which indicates that the border width is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 -1，表示未設定框線寬度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A> property to specify the width of the border.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A>屬性來指定框線的寬度。

trans-unit.source: If you do not want to display a border for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, set this property to either 0 (no border width) or -1 (border width is not set).
trans-unit.target: 如果您不想顯示的框線<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項，將此屬性設定為 0 （沒有框線寬度） 則為-1 （未設定框線寬度）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A> property to programmatically control the border width of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Border%2A>屬性以程式設計方式控制的框線寬度<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border color of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The border color of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A> property to specify the border color of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A>屬性，以指定的框線色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can specify a color either by name or by using a hexadecimal value, preceded by the pound character (#), in the form #RRGGBB.
trans-unit.target: 您可以依名稱或使用前面加上井字號字元的十六進位值，指定的色彩 （#），#RRGGBB 形式。

trans-unit.source: RR, GG, and BB represent hexadecimal values from 0 to 255 that indicate the red, green, and blue components of a color, respectively.
trans-unit.target: RR、 GG 和 BB 表示十六進位值從 0 到 255 的色彩，紅色、 綠色和藍色元件分別表示。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value #0000FF represents the color blue.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 # 0000ff> 代表藍色的色彩。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the minimum value (00) for the red and green components, while specifying the maximum value (FF) for the blue component.
trans-unit.target: 它的最小值 (00) 給紅色和綠色的元件，而指定的藍色元件為指定的最大值 (FF)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the sixteen predefined HTML color names and corresponding hexadecimal values that can be used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示十六個預先定義的 HTML 色彩名稱和對應的十六進位值，可用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on HTML colors, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 HTML 色彩的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。

trans-unit.source: The available colors for use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A> property can be determined from the <xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 搭配使用可用的色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A>屬性可由<xref:System.Drawing.KnownColor>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Color names are case-insensitive.
trans-unit.target: 色彩名稱不區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A> property to programmatically control the border color of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.BorderColor%2A>屬性以程式設計方式控制的框線色彩<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中儲存格內容與其框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中儲存格內容與其框線之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A> property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A>屬性，即可控制的儲存格的內容與儲存格的框線之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量會加入至儲存格的四個邊。

trans-unit.source: All cells in a column share the same cell width; therefore, the spacing is applied to the widest cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行中的所有資料格會共用同一個儲存格的寬度。因此，間距會套用到資料行中最寬的資料格。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, all cells in the same row share the same cell height.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，相同的資料列中的所有資料格會共用相同的儲存格高度。

trans-unit.source: The spacing is applied to the tallest cell in the row.
trans-unit.target: 間距被套用至資料列中最高的儲存格。

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: 個別儲存格大小不能指定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A> property to programmatically control the spacing between the contents of the cell and the cell's border in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellPadding%2A>屬性以程式設計方式控制的儲存格的內容與中的儲存格的框線之間的間距<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中相鄰儲存格之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between adjacent cells in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中相鄰儲存格之間的間距 (以像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default value is -1, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A> property to control the spacing between individual cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A>屬性，即可控制中的個別儲存格之間的間距<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 垂直和水平，則會套用這個間距。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A> property to programmatically control the spacing of cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CellSpacing%2A>屬性以程式設計方式控制的儲存格間距<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 控制項建立新的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control's child server controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的子伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CreateControlCollection%2A> method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection> object that is used to hold table rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CreateControlCollection%2A>方法會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection>物件，用來保存資料表資料列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CreateControlCollection%2A> method is primarily of interest to control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.CreateControlCollection%2A> 方法主要是對控制項開發人員有利，可用以擴充 <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> 控制項的功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的高度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的高度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A> property to control the height of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A>屬性，即可控制的高度<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The height is normally specified in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 像素為單位，通常被指定高度。

trans-unit.source: However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window height by appending a percent sign (%) to the value.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您也可以指定瀏覽器視窗高度的百分比在值後面附加百分比符號 （%）。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value `100%` indicates a height for the table that is the full height of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值`100%`表示資料表的全部高度瀏覽器視窗的高度。

trans-unit.source: The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size.
trans-unit.target: 資料表會自動展開，且合約會隨著使用者變更視窗大小。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的值小於顯示所需的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項，這個屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A> property to programmatically control the height of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Height%2A>屬性以程式設計方式控制的高度<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control, without automatically converting special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容，而不須自動將特殊字元轉換為對等的 HTML 實體 (Entity)。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容。

trans-unit.source: Do not read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿從讀取或將值指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則會擲回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>類別，並不適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>類別。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從這個屬性讀取值，或指派值給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content between the opening and closing tags of the control, with automatic conversion of special characters to their equivalent HTML entities.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容，且自動將特殊字元轉換為對等的 HTML 實體。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported for this control.
trans-unit.target: 這個控制項不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The content between the opening and closing tags of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的開頭和結尾標記之間的內容。

trans-unit.source: Do not read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 請勿從讀取或將值指派給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 否則會擲回 <xref:System.NotSupportedException?displayProperty=nameWithType> 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This property is inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> class and is not applicable to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>類別，並不適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>類別。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to read from or assign a value to this property.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試從這個屬性讀取值，或指派值給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 接收轉譯的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control's child controls to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的子控制項呈現為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A> method provides additional formatting before and after calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A>方法提供額外的格式之前和之後呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderChildren%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control easier to read by inserting a line return and indenting before rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control's child controls.
trans-unit.target: 其他格式會呈現的 HTML<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項容易讀取的插入傳回的列，並縮排呈現之前<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項的子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A> method in a custom server control so that a new table row is appended to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A>方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便新的資料表資料列附加至<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 接收轉譯的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control's end tag.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的結束標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderEndTag%2A> method provides additional formatting after calling the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderEndTag%2A>方法提供額外的格式，在呼叫基底類別<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.RenderEndTag%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The additional formatting makes the rendered HTML of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control easier to read by inserting a line return after the closing `<table>` tag.
trans-unit.target: 其他格式會呈現的 HTML<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項容易讀取的插入傳回結束後`<table>`標記。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A> method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderChildren%2A>主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderEndTag%2A> method so that it always writes an end tag and a new line in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> server control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.RenderEndTag%2A>方法，使其永遠結束標記和新行中寫入自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection" /> collection that contains all the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection" /> 集合，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中的所有列。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection" /> that contains all the rows in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項中所有的資料列。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> collection to programmatically access the rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>集合以程式設計方式存取中的資料列<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically add rows to, remove rows from, or insert rows into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以程式設計方式加入的資料列，從，移除資料列或資料列插入至集合。

trans-unit.source: If there are no `<tr>` elements listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何`<tr>`列出項目<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制，空<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTableRowCollection>物件傳回。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A> collection to programmatically add a row to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Rows%2A>要以程式設計方式加入的資料列集合<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable" /> 控制項的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A> property to control the width of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A>屬性，即可控制的寬度<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The width is normally specified in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 像素為單位，通常被指定寬度。

trans-unit.source: However, you can also specify a percentage of the browser window width by appending a percent sign (%) to the value.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您也可以指定瀏覽器視窗寬度的百分比在值後面附加百分比符號 （%）。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value `100%` indicates a width for the table that is the full width of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值`100%`表示寬度是瀏覽器視窗的寬度，完整的資料表。

trans-unit.source: The table automatically expands and contracts as the user changes the window size.
trans-unit.target: 資料表會自動展開，且合約會隨著使用者變更視窗大小。

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value that is smaller than is required to display the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control, this property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定的值小於顯示所需的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項，這個屬性會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A> property to programmatically control the width of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable.Width%2A>屬性以程式設計方式控制的寬度<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable>控制項。
